newsitem.title: UK: European spot oil product trades - July 10.
newsitem.headline: European spot oil product trades - July 10.

text.p: Friday - (11/7) all prices in dollars per tonne.
Gas oil - Barges: Heating oil at Aug IPE +75 cents fob
Rotterdam July 16-31
- Cargoes: 15,000 tonnes ISAB spec, Med, quotes related
Thursday (10/7)
Gasoline - Rotterdam barges $182 ARA, $183.50 ARA, $184 AR
premium unleaded. $177.75 fob Rotterdam regular.
Gas oil - Barges: heating oil Aug IPE +$1.25, +$1.50, +$1.75
prompt fob ARA. Diesel Aug IPE +$5 and +$5.25 fob
ARA.
Cargoes: 0.2 sulphur around Aug IPE $1.50 cif NWE and
+$1.75 cif Rostock July 16-31.
Diesel Aug IPE +$3.75 cif ARA July 16-31. Aug +4.50
cif NWE Aug 1-15 (X2).
Russian high cif quotes +$2.50 cif Med July 16-31.
HSFO - Barges $84.50, $85, $85.50, $86 fob ARA
Wednesday (9/7).
Gas oil - Barges: Heating oil July IPE +$1.50 fob Rotterdam.
Cargoes: Russian at fob high quotes +$4 fob Italy.
0.2 sulphur at Aug IPE +$1.75 and $2.25 cif Hamburg,
July 16-31.
Diesel Aug IPE +$4.50 prompt and Aug IPE +$3.25 by
July 20 cif NWE
LSFO - Cargoes: 70,000 tonnes, floating price
Tuesday (8/7)
Gas oil - Barges: Diesel at July IPE +$5 fob ARA
prompt. Heating oil July +$1.25 prompt. July +75
cents and +$1 July 16-31 fob ARA.
Cargoes: Diesel August IPE +$4.25 and +$4.50 cif
Germany by July 15. Russian high cif +$2.25 cif Med.
HSFO - Barges: RMG at $85/$85.50 fob, refinery $86
HSSR - Cargoes: Russian M-100, two means +$5.25
LSFO - Cargoes: 50,000 tonnes, $92.50 fob
Gasoline - Barges: fob ARA $186.50, $186.25 July
